home.schedule_description: Đ.S 2 FC plays every Monday and Friday at 6 PM.
home.event_description: This month, we joined the KINHDO PREMIER LEAGUE 2025 event featuring 8 teams. The opening match was held yesterday between Đ.S 2 FC and ANH KHÔI FC.

about_us.title: About Đ.S 2 FC
about_us.intro: Welcome to the official website of Đường Số 2 FC!
about_us.mission: To bring together passionate football players in Thủ Đức and build a strong, united team.
about_us.history: Founded in Hiệp Bình Phước, Thủ Đức, Đ.S 2 FC has grown from friendly street matches into a competitive amateur club.
about_us.culture: We welcome players of all backgrounds and focus on inclusiveness and development.
